song_name: Final Fantasy III - This is the Last Battle
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Final Fantasy III - This is the Last Battle is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Final Fantasy III - This is the Last Battle has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Minor,  and A Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
